hero.title: About NMD ASSOCIATION
hero.description: A non-profit organization dedicated to developing human capacity in African space sciences

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Promote the development of human capacity in African space sciences by training a new generation of technically competent professionals through practical satellite missions and hands-on learning opportunities.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Launch a series of nanosatellite missions (Mission 237) to train Africans and create a robust continental space ecosystem that will contribute to Africa's technological and scientific development.

excellence.description: We strive for excellence in all our training programs

impact.title: Impact
impact.description: We measure our success by the impact on the continent

hero.title: First Mission 237
hero.subtitle: Our First Educational Nanosatellite Mission
hero.description: The first Mission 237 is specially designed for French-speaking accessibility and practical training of African space professionals. This pioneering mission will lay the foundations of our educational constellation.
